name: 章裕民
objective: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
schedule:
Week 1
(CH1)Introduction
Week 2
(CH2)Definition and Characteristics of Hazardous Material and Wastes
Week 3-4
(CH3)Toxicology
Week 5-11
(CH4)Understanding Exposures from Hazards
(CH5)Workplace Monitoring
(CH6)Personal Protective Equipment
(CH7)Workplace Safety
(CH8)Management of Radiation Exposure
(CH9)Administrative Requirements
(CH10)Transportation
(CH11)Tank System
(CH12)Waste treatment and Technologies
(CH13)Groundwater and Soil
(CH14)Water Quality
(CH15)Air Quality
(CH16)Facility Environmental Assessment
(CH17)Emergency Planning
Week 12-13
Treatment of hazardous hospital waste
Biotreatment on PCB
Dioxins Abatement Technologies
Week 14-17
Oral Report
Week 18
Final Exam
scorePolicy:
作業練習(佔20 %)
期末報告(佔20 %)
期末考  (佔20 %)
其它    (10%)
materials:
1.Timbrell,J.A., Introduction to Toxicology, Taylor & Franics, 1998, 倉海書局。
2.Freeman,H.M., Hazardous Waste Minimization, McGraw-Hill Publishing Co, 2000, 倉海書局。
3.Woodside,G., Hazardous materials & Hazardous Waste Management, John Wiley & Sons, Inc, 歐亞書局。
4.Tchobanoglous, G., Integrated Soild Waste Management, McGraw-Hill, Pub Co, 2001.
